abstract: AWS kicked off the first of 16 meetings with a daylong direct assault on the existing corporate computing business. The Seattle-based cloud giant is now offering features and services for so-called hybrid clouds.
snippet: AWS kicked off the first of 16 meetings with a daylong direct assault on the existing corporate computing business. The Seattle-based cloud giant is now offering features and services for so-called hybrid clouds.
lead_paragraph: Competition for the corporate dollar didn’t take long to heat up.

headline.main: Amazon Web Services Takes Fuller Aim at Enterprise Computing
